about_the_game:
As the one who has been entrusted with their young child by FengHuang, you are going to role-playing as the father/mother of the young daughter in My Daughter in Family Ai and parenting her to the adult. During the time with your daughter, you shall take care of everything about her, support and empower her to achieve her dream of cultivation and make it into the IMMORTAL.

The Demo includes free conversations with your daughter, daily life arrangements such as shopping and changing clothes, daily cultivation, exploration, and battles. The total duration is approximately one to one and a half hours. Experience the unique charm of My Daughter in Family Ai in advance,savor the joy of simulation and cultivation in the wonderful interactions of AI conversations.

FREE CONVERSATION WITH YOUR DAUGHTER

Having free conversation about any topic during your time with your daughter. Or send text command to schedule her dailies.

MAKE EVERYDAY PLAN

Your daughter will be able to study in the Sect and be instructed by the Elders; or working in the Sect's industry to save Spirit Stone for the cultivation practice under your plan. Properly arrange rest time for her to get away from getting exhausted and falling ill. By the spare time, take her to explore the broader world, challenge the magic beast and exploit resources and rare items.

LEADING TO THE GOALS

The goal of a growing young girl might be easily affected by the surroundings. And the new change will be made to her own schedule with the new goal by her own thought, talk and communicate with her about it.

MULTIPLE ENDINGS OF DIFFERENT LIFE

With different method and attitude of parenting, the way and ending you lead her walking to have many more possibilities. Explore and collect them and check out which future you and your daughter are heading to!

——AI GAME Studio

name: My Daughter In Family Ai Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5-8400 2.80 GHz 6 Core/AMD R5 1600 3.2 GHz 6 Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB/AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel i7-9700 3.00 GHz 8 Core/AMD R5 5500 3.6 GHz 6 Core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 2060 6GB/AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT 8GB
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: As the one who has been entrusted with their young child by FengHuang, you are going to be the father/mother of the Daughter. With different method and attitude of parenting, you will lead her walk to many more possible endings.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
